versioning.title: Settings History
versioning.description: Track every export, import, and rollback with full context.
versioning.emptyState: No history yet. Create a version after major changes to keep a snapshot.

rollback.confirmation: Rollback settings to version {{version}}? Current settings will be replaced.
rollback.disabled: The latest version cannot be rolled back.
rollback.details: This replaces current settings with the selected snapshot. Summary: {{summary}}

createModal.title: Describe this snapshot
createModal.description: Use a short summary so future administrators know why this version exists.
createModal.summaryPlaceholder: e.g., After migrating prefixes to production

notifications.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

export.title: Export settings
export.description: Download a portable JSON backup that can be imported into another tenant.

import.title: Import settings
import.description: Apply a JSON backup. A history entry and undo action will be recorded automatically.

validation.noFile: Select a JSON file before importing.
